item.title: Celebrating a Milestone in the Top 2% of Global Scientists
item.description: I’m really excited to tell you that I’m one of the top 2% of scientists in the world for 2023, according to Stanford University. It’s been ten years of hard work in research and learning, and this award means a lot. üõ§Ô∏è The Journey When I started, it was easy. I had been in academic for some time as a student and research assistant. And I had the resources, for a good start.
